ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This study was supported by the Natural Science Foundation of Hebei Province (F2018202046) and State Key Laboratory of Reliability and Intelligence of Electrical Equipment (EERIZZ2018003).

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This study was funded by the Natural Science Foundation of Hebei Province (F2018202046) and State Key Laboratory of Reliability and Intelligence of Electrical Equipment (EERIZZ2018003).

sec.title: Availability of Data and Materials
sec.p: The datasets generated during and/or analyzed during the current study are available from the corresponding authors on reasonable request.
